abstract_summ: This research aims to evaluate how Korea should improve its management of the psychological impact of disasters toward the ultimate goal of effective disaster management.This study investigates China’s current disaster management system design; specifically, it identifies ways and methods for counteracting any conflicts between disaster management under social synergies and China’s emergency management system.In this paper, we provide an extensive literature review in the field of quality management in humanitarian operations and disaster relief management.In recent years, China’s main focuses for enhancing disaster management have included emergency preparation, emergency management, and legal system mechanisms.By examining the literature on the development of disaster management, we realized that enhancing self-organization in communities can effectively resolve problems caused by collective actions and strengthen resilience to disasters.
